(divide A into B)\r\nAをBに分類する:
(distinguish A from B)
AとBを区別する
(=distinguish between
A and B)
divide the cake into six pieces\r\nケーキを6: distinguish a lie from the truth\r\nうそと真実を見分ける
My opinion differs from hers.\r\n私の考えは彼女と異なる
how to educate children\r\n子供を教育する方法

(divide A into B)\r\nAをBに分類する: (borrow A from B)\r\nBからAを借りる
divide the cake into six pieces\r\nケーキを6: borrow a book from a friend\r\n友だちから本を借りる

promote economic growth\r\n経済成長を促進する
